text: Write code like the maintainer would be a violent psychopath who knows where you live
author: Steve McConnell

text: The complexity of the program grows until it exceeds the ability of the programmer.
author: Arthur Bloch. Murphy's laws

text: It's very easy to walk on water and develop programs following the ToR... if they are frozen
author: I. Berard

text: Authority and friendship are water and fire, heterogeneous and hostile things; equality is a condition of friendship
author: V. Belinsky

text: Abstraction is death to ethics, for ethics is a living relation to living life.
author: A. Schweitzer

text: A car is not a luxury, but a means of transportation
author: I. Ilf and E. Petrov.

text: Hell is the first, unsuccessful attempt to create heaven
author: V. Tshaskalsky

text: Gambling is the child of avarice, the sister of injustice, the mother of malice
author: D. Washington

text: The greedy soul is the beginning of all evil deeds
author: John Domaskin

text: America is a country of unlimited possibilities if you are a businessman from Japan
author: L. Peter

text: An army without a commander is a body without a soul
author: Kuciy
